humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the invasive component of the tumor, which is 2.3 cm in greatest dimensions. Based on the rules provided, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less in size, and T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the tumor in this report is a T2 tumor.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage of a cancer is determined by the size of the primary tumor. In this report, the size of the invasive component of the tumor is stated as 2.3 cm in greatest dimensions. According to the TNM staging system, a T2 stage tumor has a size of 2.0-5.0 cm. Therefore, the predicted T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
